content:
In the Genomics Reporting IG, we started noticing the following QA errors:

The link 'http://hl7.org/fhir/"element-definitions.html#Element.id' for "id" cannot be resolved

The HTML looks like this:

<a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/"element-definitions.html#Element.id">id</a>

I have seen a few IG Build notifications, and I am seeing errors showing up that look similar. edited after a quick review of recent builds

@Grahame Grieve any ideas?
yes, will be fixed next release - planned for 2-3 hours from now
@Grahame Grieve - It seems this problem is still occurring with the latest release of the Publisher.
I haven't got a new release out yet
